member.name: T:Com.Mobeelizer.Mobile.Wp7.Api.MobeelizerSyncStatus
member.summary: The status of current sync.

member.name: F:Com.Mobeelizer.Mobile.Wp7.Api.MobeelizerSyncStatus.NONE
member.summary: Sync has not been executed in the existing user session.

member.name: F:Com.Mobeelizer.Mobile.Wp7.Api.MobeelizerSyncStatus.STARTED
member.summary: Sync is in progress. The file with local changes is being prepared.

member.name: F:Com.Mobeelizer.Mobile.Wp7.Api.MobeelizerSyncStatus.FILE_CREATED
member.summary: Sync is in progress. The file with local changes has been prepared and now is being transmitted to the cloud.

member.name: F:Com.Mobeelizer.Mobile.Wp7.Api.MobeelizerSyncStatus.TASK_CREATED
member.summary: Sync is in progress. The file with local changes has been transmitted to the cloud. Waiting for the cloud to finish processing sync.

member.name: F:Com.Mobeelizer.Mobile.Wp7.Api.MobeelizerSyncStatus.TASK_PERFORMED
member.summary: Sync is in progress. The file with cloud changes has been prepared and now is being transmitted to the device.

member.name: F:Com.Mobeelizer.Mobile.Wp7.Api.MobeelizerSyncStatus.FILE_RECEIVED
member.summary: Sync is in progress. The file with cloud changes has been transmitted to the device cloud and now is being inserted into local database.

member.name: F:Com.Mobeelizer.Mobile.Wp7.Api.MobeelizerSyncStatus.FINISHED_WITH_SUCCESS
member.summary: Sync has been finished successfully.

member.name: F:Com.Mobeelizer.Mobile.Wp7.Api.MobeelizerSyncStatus.FINISHED_WITH_FAILURE
member.summary: Sync has not been finished successfully. Look for the explanation in the application logs.

member.name: T:Com.Mobeelizer.Mobile.Wp7.Api.MobeelizerSyncStatusExtension
member.summary: Extension to the sync status.

member.name: M:Com.Mobeelizer.Mobile.Wp7.Api.MobeelizerSyncStatusExtension.IsRunning(Com.Mobeelizer.Mobile.Wp7.Api.MobeelizerSyncStatus)
member.summary: Indicates whether sync task is running.

member.name: T:Com.Mobeelizer.Mobile.Wp7.Api.MobeelizerOperationCallback
member.summary: Method invoked when the operation was finished.
member.param: Null if method finished with success, error value otherwise.

member.summary: Restore mobeelizer applicaion state after tombstoning. Execute this method in your App.xaml.cs when application is activated.
member.param: Indicates whether yuours application instance is preserved.

member.name: M:Com.Mobeelizer.Mobile.Wp7.Mobeelizer.OnDeactivated
member.summary: Saves mobeelizer application state before tombstoning. Execute this method in your App.xaml.cs when application is deactivated.

member.summary: Closes user session when yours application is closing.

member.summary: Close the user session.

member.summary: Start a differential sync. You can check sync status using event.

member.exception: If user session is not active.

member.summary: Check and return the status of current sync.

member.summary: Create a new file with a given name and content. The returned file is ready to use as a field in the entity.
member.exception: If user session is not active.

member.summary: Create a file with a given name that points to a file with a given guid. Note that there is no new file created. The returned file is ready to use as a field in the entity.
member.exception: If user session is not active.
